thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Lesa Tiatia

author: Lesa Tiatia
title: Lesa Tiatia
text:
I have had really bad experiences in the past thru other sites...then I came across this one ..TravelHub...so I thought I would give it a try although I was skeptical..BUT..I HAD NO PROBLEM WHATSOEVER..MY BOOKING WAS CONFIRMED IN SECONDS AND MY ITINERARY WAS SENT TO ME in a matter of seconds.. I was excited..still excited.and cant wait to go on my trip.. I have given your website to my family they are meeting me in the islands in June this year and theres about 20 of them..its our family reunion..so I hope your rates stays enticing as they have so you can get all my familys bookings.. thank you again so much..
You deserve 5 starts FlightHub
